title: Duo 7 -in- (Series)
description: Instant Pot(R) Duo Series is a 7-in-1 programmable cooker, built on our best selling Lux series.The Duo Series combines the functions of as pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice/porridge maker, steamer, sauté/browning, yogurt maker and warmer
